item.description:
@ShadowShaft wrote:

[code]
public String badWord[] = {“fuck”, “spam”, “fag”};

public String getBadWord(String badWord) 
{
		badWord = badWord;
   return badWord;
}

public void wordCheck(String badWord) 
{
    for(int i = 0; i <= 1; i++) 
    {
   	String badword = badWord[i];

if(badWord.equals(badWord) || (badWord.startsWith(badWord))) {
txt4 = “****”;
}
}
}[/code]

item.title: Does anyone have or no how to make a code for this?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

go to player.java and find

String temp = misc.textUnpack(chatText, chatTextSize);

under that add

        String temp2 = censorStr(temp);

then find

GenerateC

then under this

} return temp; }
add this

[code]public String censorStr(String str)
{
String temp = str;
try
{
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(“data/censor.txt”));
String data = null;
while ((data = in.readLine()) != null)
{
String temp2 = data;
temp = temp.replaceAll(temp2, GenerateC(temp2.length()));
}
}
catch (IOException e)
{
System.out.println(“Critical error while checking is a censored word”);
e.printStackTrace();
}
return temp;

}[/code]

then once you save and exit go to ./data/
and make a file called censor.txt
and put all your swear words like this

word
word
word
word

understand?
then compile your server

Read full topic
